author: Daniel Greene
description:
In this video, I delve into the recent IGN article discussing the upcoming Wheel of Time AAA open-world RPG. The article presents information that seems to contradict earlier reports, particularly concerning the game's projected development timeline. The article: https://www.ign.com/articles/the-wheel-of-time-aaa-open-world-rpg-is-legit-its-developers-insist-but-dont-hold-your-breath-for-a-release-date-it-could-be-a-ps6-and-next-xbox-game 

We'll explore:

The origins of the 3-year development estimate and its initial reporting about the wheel of time rpg.

Discrepancies between the IGN article and the original Variety announcement of the wheel of time game news.

The implications of these inconsistencies for fans and the credibility of the game's development team.

Join me as we seek clarity and hold the conversation accountable.

📚 My Books:

Neon Ghosts: A Witch's Sin Hardcover: https://shop.wraithmarked.com/collections/standard-editions-1/products/neon-ghosts-a-witchs-sin-hardcove
title: They Are Trying To Gaslight You About Wheel Of Time
